title: New: The Horrors – Still Life
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/thehorrorsstillife.jpg "thehorrorsstillife")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8171-new-the-horrors-still-life/attachment/thehorrorsstillife)  
On July 26 all our questions will be answered in the form of a brand new LP. But for now we have this synth/string-laden delight. At times it’s painfully obvious, at others it’s flourishingly creepy and perverse. Check it out bellow.

excerpt.full: On July 26 all our questions will be answered in the form of a brand new LP. But for now we have this synth/string-laden delight. At times it’s painfully obvious, at others it’s flourishingly creepy and perverse. Check it out bellow.
